query: SELECT id, clientId, filename, uploadedAt, goalsText, currentStatusText, recommendationsText FROM nutrition_reports WHERE clientId = 990036 ORDER BY uploadedAt DESC LIMIT 1;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3Acm1QzHQhQUgLe.35139a5d2a11 --database CVoYWTwV8QMMBSnZsHHM3q --execute SELECT id, clientId, filename, uploadedAt, goalsText, currentStatusText, recommendationsText FROM nutrition_reports WHERE clientId = 990036 ORDER BY uploadedAt DESC LIMIT 1;
messages: 1	990036	RobertMorganReport.pdf	2026-02-11 09:46:33	**Weight Management:** Achieve a target body weight of under 70 kg
**Body Composition:** Reduce visceral fat accumulation
**Macronutrient Balance:** Increase daily protein intake to 2g per kilogram of body weight, equating to approximately 140-150g per day
**Sleep Quality:** Improve sleep duration and quality to achieve a consistent 7-8 hours per night
**Hydration:** Establish and maintain a consistent daily fluid intake of 3 litres, primarily from water	**Current Weight:** 75-77 kg
**Body Mass Index (BMI):** ~27 kg/m² (overweight)
**Current Protein Intake:** 80-90g daily
**Visceral Fat:** ~5 kg
**Sleep Patterns:** Significantly disrupted, maximum 5 hours per night, frequent waking at 4:00 AM
**Hydration:** Inconsistent	**Macronutrient Adjustments**
Nearly double protein intake; evening meal target 35-40g protein; utilize high-protein sources like 0% fat Greek yogurt and consider whey protein supplementation.
**Macronutrient Adjustments**
Reduce carbohydrate portion sizes by half in the evening meal, replace with non-starchy vegetables; limit fast-acting carbohydrates before bedtime.
**Macronutrient Adjustments**
Maintain current total fat intake (0.8-1g per kg body weight); reduce olive oil usage by substituting with calorie-controlled spray alternative.
**Meal & Snack Strategy**
Replace evening chocolate and biscuit cravings with a structured, high-protein snack (e.g., protein bar with ~20g protein, ~20g carbohydrates).
**Meal Planning**
A food template guide will be provided to assist with meal planning, especially for travel situations.
**Lifestyle Modifications**
Implement strict sleep hygiene: consistent bedtime/wake-up time, avoid blue light 60-90 minutes before bed.
**Lifestyle Modifications**
Gradually increase fluid intake towards 3 litres daily, primarily water.

id	clientId	filename	uploadedAt	goalsText	currentStatusText	recommendationsText
1	990036	RobertMorganReport.pdf	2026-02-11 09:46:33	**Weight Management:** Achieve a target body weight of under 70 kg

**Body Composition:** Reduce visceral fat accumulation

**Macronutrient Balance:** Increase daily protein intake to 2g per kilogram of body weight, equating to approximately 140-150g per day

**Sleep Quality:** Improve sleep duration and quality to achieve a consistent 7-8 hours per night

**Hydration:** Establish and maintain a consistent daily fluid intake of 3 litres, primarily from water	**Current Weight:** 75-77 kg

**Body Mass Index (BMI):** ~27 kg/m² (overweight)

**Current Protein Intake:** 80-90g daily

**Visceral Fat:** ~5 kg

**Sleep Patterns:** Significantly disrupted, maximum 5 hours per night, frequent waking at 4:00 AM

**Hydration:** Inconsistent	**Macronutrient Adjustments**
Nearly double protein intake; evening meal target 35-40g protein; utilize high-protein sources like 0% fat Greek yogurt and consider whey protein supplementation.

**Macronutrient Adjustments**
Reduce carbohydrate portion sizes by half in the evening meal, replace with non-starchy vegetables; limit fast-acting carbohydrates before bedtime.

**Macronutrient Adjustments**
Maintain current total fat intake (0.8-1g per kg body weight); reduce olive oil usage by substituting with calorie-controlled spray alternative.

**Meal & Snack Strategy**
Replace evening chocolate and biscuit cravings with a structured, high-protein snack (e.g., protein bar with ~20g protein, ~20g carbohydrates).

**Meal Planning**
A food template guide will be provided to assist with meal planning, especially for travel situations.

**Lifestyle Modifications**
Implement strict sleep hygiene: consistent bedtime/wake-up time, avoid blue light 60-90 minutes before bed.

**Lifestyle Modifications**
Gradually increase fluid intake towards 3 litres daily, primarily water.
